summary: Changes the Haggling perk in the speechcraft tree to be less costly and more effective
descriptionHtml:
I made this mod as a request, so if it doesn\'t seem \"balanced\" to some people, that\'s because it isn\'t supposed to be.This mod changes the haggling perk in the speechcraft tree to only have 1 rank instead of 5, while at the same time increasing the bonus of rank 1 from vanilla\'s crappy 10%, up to 60%. Enjoy.

This mod probably won\'t be compatible with any other mod that changes the haggling perk, but I don\'t think there are too many of those.
author: FWB
